name: Polar Jump
description:
Polar Jump is a first person parkour platformer. Prepare to explore and save this ice-cold world.

Features:

  • Mechanics: Wall-jumping, crouching, sliding, climbing, running, throwing snowballs
  • Map mechanics: Jumping pads, ladders
  • Simple levels to go through
  • Snow ambiance and feel
  • Short, continuous play
  • Secrets to collect throughout the map
  • Puzzles
